### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#29868](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29868) (Reintroduce external signer support for Windows by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

review ACK 7bd3ee62f6d6f59ca599e85f81776d282dee1539

Seems fine to replace the `python3` dependency with `sh`, assuming that `sh` is available on more systems (at least on all systems where `ls` was previously available)

ACK 7bd3ee62f6d6f59ca599e85f81776d282dee1539.

The new command does exactly what is described in the comment above.

Both `sh` and `echo` are expected to be available on systems where `ls` (from the original implementation) is available.
